data.title: Author Correction: A shared disease-associated oligodendrocyte signature among multiple CNS pathologies (Nature Neuroscience, (2022), 25, 7, (876-886), 10.1038/s41593-022-01104-7)
data.text:
TY - JOUR

T1 - Author Correction

T2 - A shared disease-associated oligodendrocyte signature among multiple CNS pathologies (Nature Neuroscience, (2022), 25, 7, (876-886), 10.1038/s41593-022-01104-7)

N2 - In the version of this article originally published, there was an error in the topmost label (“LPS injection”) in Figure 4f. The citation to Lee et al. 2021 should have been to Hasel et al. 2021 (Nat. Neurosci. 24, 1475–1487 (2021)). The figure has been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.

AB - In the version of this article originally published, there was an error in the topmost label (“LPS injection”) in Figure 4f. The citation to Lee et al. 2021 should have been to Hasel et al. 2021 (Nat. Neurosci. 24, 1475–1487 (2021)). The figure has been corrected in the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
